title: GitHub projects
para: GitHub bringing together my academic and personal projects as well as my open-source contributions. REST APIs, mobile applications, Python scripts...

title: Transatlantic Cultures
subtitle: Cultural site
para: Development of a multilingual site with a static site generator. Proof of concept of the Gatsby framework to simplify the current site Transatlantic cultures.

title: Portfolio back-office
subtitle: Website management interface
para: Tutored second year project at MMI, with a real client. Development of a CMS-type back office allowing you to modify pages, articles and manage a photo gallery. Development in native PHP, for the site adrienlefloch.fr

title: My videos
subtitle: Video shooting and editing
para:
Playlist of my audiovisual creations!
Personal and professional projects.

title: Street Spirit
subtitle: Graphic charter and showcase site
para:
Graphic charter intended for a sportswear brand wanting to renew its image. Creation of banners for the new spring collection 'Street Spring', a showcase website (with a CMS) and an iconotype and logotype logo .
Score obtained: 17/20

title: VueJS applications
subtitle: Web tool series
para: Development of a series of applications with the Javascript framework Vue.js. Practical tools such as: calculator, task list, password generator.

title: Advertising « Blois Eats »
subtitle: Advertising parody
para:
Creation of a fictitious advertising video for a food delivery service. Shooting, acting, editing and post-production. Produced with other MMI students.
Score obtained: 16/20
links: Link to the video

title: C pire que beau
subtitle: Creation and design
para: Logotype for a self-employed woman wishing to launch her jewelry brand.

title: Maison de la magie
subtitle: Web design and CMS development
para:
Fictional project for a corporate blog for the Maison de lamagique in Blois. Reflection on online communication and marketing strategies. Design of a dynamic website with a CMS.
Score obtained: 17/20

title: Muriel Cooper
subtitle: Documentary file
para:
Constitution of a twenty-page file on an emblematic graphic designer of the 20th century.
Score obtained: 18/20

title: L'incroyable
subtitle: Graphic charter and showcase site
para:
One-week tutored project. Development of a brand including a website (in HTML and CSS) and a visual identity.
Score obtained: 14.9/20
